name: rapping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
rap
the activity of performing a style of popular music that involves speaking, rather than singing, words to music that has a strong rhythm: There's a great backing track beneath the rapping and singing. See also
rap noun (MUSIC)
More examplesFewer examplesHe treated us all to some awesome rapping.Some rappers struggle to blend their rapping with music that is just as inventive.I think my music teacher is a bit old for rapping.There's something about his rapping that is so passionate.
